structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
ISSUANCE OF BONDS AND CONTROL OF FUNDS

law.history: Repealed 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 280, sec. 30, effective July 15, 1996. -- Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 297, effective July 13, 1990. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 186c-7.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Proof required to obtain approval of county, city, or taxing district bonds or obligations.
